# Code examples

### create an API object

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";


await ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
const API = new ServisBotSdk.BaaS.API(
  { alias: 'google', endpoint: 'http://www.google.com' }
);
console.log(API.alias); // "google"
```
